content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time news or information about Delta Air Lines' specific security incidents. However, like all large airlines, Delta Air Lines has likely faced security situations in the past and has developed emergency protocols to respond to them.

In general, Delta Air Lines has a well-trained crisis management team in place to manage security incidents. Depending on the nature and scope of the incident, Delta Air Lines' crisis management team works closely with local law enforcement, airport security personnel, and other relevant authorities to respond quickly and effectively.

Delta Air Lines' security protocols likely include a range of measures, such as evacuating affected aircraft or sections of the airport, interviewing witnesses, implementing quarantine procedures, and providing support to affected passengers and employees. Delta Air Lines will also likely conduct an internal investigation to identify any areas for improvement in their security and response protocols.

Delta Air Lines places a strong emphasis on safety and security, and they have an excellent reputation for handling security situations with professionalism and care for their passengers and employees.
